name: Tonic Trouble
description:
Tonic Trouble is an arcade game developed by Ubisoft Montreal, Ubisoft Montpellier, small and Ubi Soft Montpellier. It was originally released in 1998. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Tonic Trouble on Nintendo 64, Game Boy Color and PC.
Gérard Guillemot and Grégoire Gobbi produced the game. François Mahieu and Sandrine Polegato directed the game. Eric Chevalier scored the game.
